Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length.

resource.description: The AWS::GameLift::Location resource creates an Amazon GameLift (GameLift) custom location.
